title: I want my rp
body: Hi I'm muckuducky 123 and I was trying to get my friends jojoloco1 a skin for aatrox because he got his first pentakill with that champion, but it said I couldn't yet it still took 5 dollars from my account. I would like my 5 dollar RP please.

replies.body: You have to wait a little bit before gifting a new friend as a security precaution per the [gifting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).  It looks like the gift was sent successfully.  Let me now if this is still an issue!
